tag_list: naveen-gupta, yahoo, utstarcom, harvard-business-school, nyu-stern, london-busines-school, bits-pilani
overview:
Naveen Gupta is an entrepreneur, innovator, executive with experience building startups and growing $100M+ P&Ls.

Naveen is currently Chief Product Officer at RingCentral Inc. the #1 cloud communications and mobile apps, pre-IPO startup backed by Sequoia, Khosla and Cisco.

Until 2011, Naveen was Vice President of Sales at Monster Worldwide. He joined Monster’s executive team as part of $225M HotJobs acquisition from Yahoo. Naveen spent 5 years at Yahoo, where he ran $100M business unit P&L. He launched several industry leading, innovative products across recruitment advertising, consumer search, social media, listings, monetization. Filed 4 patents.

Naveen was part of startup leadership team at UTStarcom, the fastest growing company in 2000, that grew revenue from $200M to $2.9B in 5 years. He ran strategic sales and marketing for Broadband BU ($1B) in US and Europe.

Naveen is on the Advisory Board of many Bay area startups. He holds an MBA, Finance from NYU Stern and London Business School; Executive Education from Harvard Business School; and BS in Electrical Engineering from BITS Pilani, India.

He lives in Sunnyvale with his wife and 2 kids, loves to play table tennis and an avid NBA (Lakers) fan.
